title: Way Too Complicated!
description: He’s a big city dinosaur detective who leaps through time to adopt seven interracial children. She’s a ghost with seven interracial ghost children of her own. Now they’re all moving to the country to become district attorneys. And watch the sparks fly when mother moves in!
altHero: a Brady Bunch like grid of family members made up of various dinosaurs and ghosts
alt1: a male dinosaur in a shirt and tie and trenchcoat
alt2: the dinosaur surrounded by his seven dinosaur children
alt3: a ghost surrounded by her seven ghost children
alt4: a dinosaur grandma in a bathrobe and night cap
